title: Chicken tagine with honey and prunes

ingredients.content: 2 pinches freshly ground black pepper, to taste

preparations.content: Place onions and garlic into mixing bowl, chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add 1 tbsp olive oil and sauté <b>3 min/120°C/speed 1<b> without measuring cup.

Add 300 g water to mixing bowl. Insert simmering basket and place chicken, 3 pinches of salt, pepper, coriander, cumin, allspice, prunes and figs in it and steam <b>15 min/Varoma/speed <b>. Meanwhile, place semolina, 1 tbsp olive oil and 3 pinches salt into a large bowl and mix with a fork. Add raisins and remaining water and allow to soak for a few minutes.

Remove simmering basket with spatula. Add honey and almonds to contents of mixing bowl. Reinsert simmering basket. Transfer semolina onto Varoma tray and spread it, place Varoma into position and steam <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Fluff up semolina using a fork and transfer to a serving dish. Arrange meat and  dried fruits all around it. Serve sauce separately.

hintsAndTricks: For a less sweet tagine, adjust the quantity of honey or add a little freshly squeezed lemon juice.
